name: Hahn Furniture Company, Appellant, v. East Hills Center, Inc. et al.
name_abbreviation: Hahn Furniture Co. v. East Hills Center, Inc.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Nix and Mandeeino, JJ.
Mr. Justice Pomeboy took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Hahn Furniture Company, Appellant, v. East Hills Center, Inc. et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellant.
Mr. Justice Pomeboy took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Judd N. Poffinberger, Jr., with him David R. Levin, and Kirkpatrick, Lockhwt, Johnson é Hutchison, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Hahn Furniture Company, Appellant, v. East Hills Center, Inc. et al.
Argued September 28, 1971;
reargued September 25, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Nix and Mandeeino, JJ.
Reuben Fingold, for appellant.
Judd N. Poffinberger, Jr., with him David R. Levin, and Kirkpatrick, Lockhwt, Johnson é Hutchison, for appellees.
November 17, 1972:
